articles.description: UEFA is considering completing the 2019-20 Champions League campaign with a mini-tournament, sources have told ESPN.
articles.content:
UEFA is considering completing the 2019-20 Champions League campaign with a mini-tournament, and Lisbon is one of three options to be the host city, sources have told ESPN.

articles.title: Dan Quinn, Thomas Dimitroff lead Falcons contingent in Atlanta walk - ESPN
articles.description: Several players, coaches and team officials from the Falcons took part in a peaceful protest walk organized by a local Atlanta group. Coach Dan Quinn and general manager Thomas Dimitroff highlighted the team's contingent.
articles.content:
Coach Dan Quinn and general manager Thomas Dimitroff joined fellow members of the Atlanta Falcons' organization to walk in a peaceful protest Sunday in an ongoing effort to end racial injustice.
